Queries.Name: GetItemsForHackathon
Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM CandevItemsIndex where ContentType ='{{type}}'

Queries.Name: GetScoreEntry
Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM CandevItemsIndex where ContentType ='Score' and TeamContentItemId = '{{teamContentItemId}}' and Owner = '{{owner}}'

Queries.Name: GetTeam
Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM CandevItemsIndex where ContentType ='Team' and ContentItemId = '{{teamContentItemId}}'

Queries.Name: GetChallengeSubmissionsForOwner
Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM CandevItemsIndex WHERE ContentType ='Challenge' AND Owner = '{{owner}}'
